name: Wally Bloby
description:
Game made for the WeeklyJam #190.

Summary of the game

Help Bloby the blob to climb the wall as far as possible by avoiding ennemies and obstacles on your way! Bloby can teleport himself from one wall to another.

Try to collect the different bonus to have a better score or just to save your life!

Controls

Left and Right Arrow keys for moving from a wall to another.

Up and Down Arrows for moving vertically.

Space for launch the game.

Escape for the menu.

Use your mouse to click on the start button.

The Team

BladeRED --> Game Design, Original idea and Graphics

Djé ricane --> Programmation, Advices, super cool parralax cloud

Silverdell --> Sound Design, Level music, Title screen music

This game has been developped on Game Maker Studio 2.
